marklogic.body:
Our full recovery isn't guaranteed? What was your first clue?
The ability of the nouveau regime to utterly delude itself about declining trajectories of events - and hence also the proper characterization of its own collective behavior as 'looting' or 'fiddling while Rome Burns' - would be dumbfounding were it not essentially characteristic of virtually every nearly-exhausted, over-leveraged power aggregate and ruling class in history. To such an extent, it almost seems now, that we could learn to forecast the fall of great powers by observation of their own diminishing capacity to maintain long-Scope control over events.
Assuming, of course, that there was that much continuous history left to live through.
